Package it.polimi.ingsw.game_view.board

Class GameBoard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.game_view.board.GameBoard
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
GameBoardAdvanced
public class GameBoard extends Object implements Serializable
Class representing the game board in a light way to transmit fewer data as possible
